references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This work introduces latent diffusion models, a foundational technique for high-quality image synthesis that is relevant to the architecture of GPT4o.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper is important because it deals with rectified flow transformers for generating high quality images, and is used for scaling image creation

references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with clip latents
references.reason: CLIP latents are used to connect images and text to create the image. Since GPT-ImgEval concerns image and text generation, this paper is a large factor in determining the outcome of the overall result.

references.paper_title: Geneval: An object-focused framework for evaluating text-to-image alignment
references.reason: GenEval is a benchmark used for the evaluation of generated images and its relatedness to text.

references.paper_title: Smartedit: Exploring complex instruction-based image editing with multimodal large language models
references.reason: This is used to determine the model's ability to edit images based on complex instruction.
